item.title: Audio production
item.description: This is how you can configure Artix Linux for audio production. The steps should work for any Arch-based linux distro. tldr; Run yay -S linux-rt jack2 qjackctl ardour guitarix a2jmidid pro-audio lv2-plugins. This will take hours to finish, because of linux-rt. Create the files with the content inside code blocks below, and regenerate grub.cfg. Make sure you run the configured pulseaudio and jackd when you want sound. If you have a MIDI device, run a2jmidid -e to add it as an input device.
